about_the_game: Step into the eerie depths of ancient ruins in this demo version of Ritualist. Face off against the first wave of eldritch horrors in procedurally generated dungeons, where every encounter offers new challenges. Experiment with different weapons, choose a patron entity, and test your combat skills in this thrilling preview of the full game. Will you survive the darkness, or will it consume you?
